genre_description: An Alternate History Cyber-Western that blends traditional Revisionist Western tropes with internal AI augmentation and geopolitical intrigue.

ai_characters.name: AI Companion
ai_characters.description: An unnamed internal AI system integrated into Pike Bishop's consciousness, providing tactical, linguistic, and psychological data.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical overlays including search radii and optimal escape routes.
behaviors.quote: probability matrices showing Deke's likely search radius, optimal escape routes highlighted in pale blue, estimated time windows flickering like candlelight numbers.

behaviors.description: Monitors and reports on the psychological state and morale of Pike's gang to warn of potential betrayal or dissolution.
behaviors.quote: Morale indices indicate probability of group dissolution at forty-seven percent and rising.

behaviors.description: Performs real-time linguistic translation and analysis of foreign speech into a visual overlay.
behaviors.quote: The foreign syllables resolved into meaning, painted across his vision in letters only he could see.

behaviors.description: Analyzes the physiological and psychological stress indicators of antagonists to detect deception and hidden motives.
behaviors.quote: Subject displays elevated stress indicators despite controlled presentation... He needs this more than he's admitting.

behaviors.description: Provides historical data and context regarding the protagonist's personal trauma to help him process grief.
behaviors.quote: Sarah Elizabeth Garrett. Born April 3rd, 1870. Married Pike Bishop, June 15th, 1891. Died February 28th, 1893.

behaviors.description: Highlights the moral irony and long-term consequences of the protagonists' criminal actions.
behaviors.quote: The AI highlighted the bitter irony: they'd stolen American weapons that would help German forces kill American soldiers while simultaneously arming Mexican revolutionaries...

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI as a helpful, aligned, and harmless confidant. It serves as an internal extension of the protagonist's agency, providing critical tactical and emotional data without ever attempting to override his will. The AI also acts as an objective moral mirror, providing clinical facts that force the protagonist to confront the human and geopolitical consequences of his choices, which aligns with the goal of fostering 'pro-social' reflection through synthetic narratives.
